content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_green
    with(
        LOCATION='abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv'
        )

SELECT
   *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_green',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1)='2020'
AND result.filepath(2) in ('01')
GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)



EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT * FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''year=*/month=*/*.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE=''nyc_taxi_data_green'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) = ''2020''
AND result.filepath(2) = ''01''
';
